resources.string: The Mazda RX-7 is a sports car produced by the Japanese automaker Mazda from 1978 to 2002. The second generation was produced from 1985 to 1991 and is referred to as an FC RX-7. This is because all the chassis codes for this generation started with the letters FC.

Engine- 2 Rotor Wankel 
 Power- 150HP Naturally Aspirated/ 200HP Turbo 
 Wheelbase- 2,431 mm (95.7 in) 
 Length- 1986-88: 4,290 mm (168.9 in) 
 1989–1991: 4,315 mm (169.9 in) 
 Width- 1,689 mm (66.5 in) 
 Height- 1,265 mm (49.8 in) 
 Curb weight- 1,223–1,413 kg (2,696–3,115 lb) 
 Weight distribution- 50F/50R
